question: Which is a benefit of encapsulation when developing complex programs?

answers.text: All objects can easily access and modify each other's data.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: If all objects can modify each other's data, the complex program becomes more difficult to organize and debug. Encapsulation involves restricting data access.

answers.text: Each object's data is restricted for intentional access.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Limiting data access prevents accidental changes and makes relationships between objects clearer.

detailedSolution: Limiting data access prevents accidental changes and makes relationships between objects clearer.
